Text:
Description Correction:

Contains the CD that comes with Creative Zen Vision M 30gb.
Language: English only.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Mount using DAEMON Tools, or burn to a CD
2. Open CD
3. Click 'setup.exe' to run as autorun


To install individual components, go to Pde>*component name*>setup.exe


Includes Creative Media Toolbox:
Pde>MToolbox>setup.exe

Thanks so much for this upload, I've lost my CD and creative only have the vista vesion of the software available to download.

You are a wonderful perso :-))
Is there a serial available for Creative Media Toolbox and what version is it?
